Index.title: RealTWNOG
Index.subtitle: Taiwan Network Operators Group
Index.description: A community of network operators in Taiwan, dedicated to providing a platform for network interconnection cooperation and technical exchange.
Index.mission_text: RealTWNOG aims to promote technical exchange and cooperation among network operators in Taiwan, establishing an open and sharing professional community to enhance the stability and security of network infrastructure.
Index.whatWeDo_item3: Best Practices Discussion for Network Infrastructure

Common.footer_description: A community of network operators in Taiwan, dedicated to providing a platform for network interconnection cooperation and technical exchange.

Events.title: Events
Events.subtitle: Join our technical exchanges and sharing sessions
Events.description: Explore various technical conferences, workshops, and networking events hosted by RealTWNOG, where you can learn and grow with network experts.

About.title: About Us
About.description: Learn about RealTWNOG's mission and history
About.history_text: RealTWNOG was founded in 2020 by a group of engineers passionate about network infrastructure, dedicated to establishing a local network operations exchange platform in Taiwan.
About.mission_text: To promote technical exchange and cooperation among network operators in Taiwan, improving the quality and security of network infrastructure.
About.value1_text: We believe that knowledge sharing promotes industry-wide progress.
About.value2_text: We value technical professionalism and are committed to providing high-quality technical content.
About.value3_text: We encourage collaboration among members to solve network operation challenges together.
About.history_2024: Became a significant network technology exchange platform in Taiwan and established cooperation with international network organizations.
About.history_2025: Continue to promote network technology exchange and maintain cooperation with international network organizations.
About.commitment_1: Promoting technical exchange and cooperation among network operators
About.commitment_2: Providing guidance and resources for network technology best practices
About.commitment_3: Building a community network of network professionals in Taiwan
About.values_description: These core values guide all our activities and decisions, enabling us to better serve the community.

Members.title: Member List
Members.description: Meet our community members and partners
Members.benefit4: Build industry connections and cooperation opportunities
Members.join_discord: Join our Discord community now to learn more about membership application.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to contact us
Contact.name: Name
Contact.subject: Subject
Contact.faq1_answer: Most events are free. Special workshops or conferences may have a reasonable fee, but members usually enjoy discounts.
Contact.faq2_question: How can I become a speaker or share content?
Contact.faq2_answer: Please contact us through this form or Discord with your proposed topic and content outline.
